subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Mardy Fish and James Blake are as close as brothers, and Fish’s 6-3, 6-3, 7-6 (4) victory had an edge that cut all the way into the stands, where Blake’s supporters, the J-Block, were gathered.
snippet: Mardy Fish and James Blake are as close as brothers, and Fish’s 6-3, 6-3, 7-6 (4) victory had an edge that cut all the way into the stands, where Blake’s supporters, the J-Block, were gathered.
